page.title: 04ESTCOTS
page.content: A new estate has been built opposite Herontyre. Just under 400 plots were made available.The concern expressed by local authorities was that extensive woodland had to remain as a boundary to the estate and no development was allowed until 2 major roads had been laid-Woodberry Drive and Estcots Drive.The estate is sited at the bottom of a shallow valley and the flow of water was a major problem and this led to the doubling in the size of the sewage pipes being laid as the others were inadequate.The children on the estate have 2 play sites- something stipulated by the council.An extension into the surrounding woodland is forbidden.
